ingredients.content: 7 oz unsalted butter, softened, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Place sugar into mixing bowl and grind <b>1 min/speed 10<b>.
Add butter, milk and vanilla and mix <b>1 min/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix <b>20 sec/speed 4<b>.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk<b> and whip <b>1 min/speed 3<b>. <b>Remove butterfly whisk<b> and use as needed.
